description: United Nations Development Programme (UNDP/SGP) in Trinidad and Tobago to address social vulnerabilities  through grant funding to Civil Society Organisations

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: To provide grant funding and support to Civil Society Organisations for the implementation of Community Based Projects to address social vulnerabilities in a sustainable manner
donor_long: JB Fernandes Memorial Trust Fund II
subproject.title: UNDP/SGP
